item.title: Aspose.Finance for .NET 22.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Finance for .NET 22.6. Section=ResponseHeader Detail=CR must be followed by LF” Bug

item.title: Aspose.Finance for .NET 22.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Finance for .NET 22.4. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category FINANCENET-115 Can not generate typedMember element Bug FINANCENET-116 Use the original namespace prefix when generating files instead of regenerating the prefix Improvement FINANCENET-119 Fix the bug that concept gets the wrong XbrlNamespaceUri Bug FINANCENET-135 Improve xbrl to html report feature Improvement FINANCENET-137 Issue when setting embedded license to ‘Produce Single file’ in .
